description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Cancun, Mexico. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Cancun Five-Star Oceanfront Sanctuary with Eight Mouthwatering Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Spend balmy nights on the Caribbean coast embraced by the emerald tropics at Cancun’s coveted NIZUC Resort & Spa. This oceanfront retreat is situated along one of Mexico's most alluring coastlines, boasting eight distinguished restaurants and bars, from authentic upscale Mexican delights to Asian and Mediterranean cuisines. Feel invigorated by wellness treatments at the NIZUC MedSpa before taking a dip in the crystal-clear ocean waters or lounging by the adults-only pool.

hotels.title: Oceanfront Cancun Escape with Private Beach, Infinity Pool & Beach Club
hotels.description: Experience the perfect blend of fun and luxury at this sun-soaked pocket of paradise, nestled along 250 metres of private beachfront with views of the Caribbean Sea. Relax at the exclusive Bungalow Pool & Beach Club, lounge on ocean-view daybeds, sip tropical cocktails and savour artisan bites. Enjoy a round of golf on the 18-hole course, tuck into Eastern Mediterranean dishes at Cleo and try world-class kite surfing. Just a 10-minute walk away, you'll find chic shopping at Marina Puerto Cancun, complete with trendy restaurants and a cinema.

hotels.title: Adults-Only Cancun Beachfront Paradise with Caribbean Ocean Vistas, Nine Bars & Five Restaurants
hotels.description: Oceanfront luxury awaits at the adults-only, all-suite Haven Riviera Cancun, a tropical all-inclusive paradise. Here, the only thing that can compete with the Caribbean Sea vistas are the incredible resort facilities: there are nine uber-cool bars to toast a cocktail or two at (including two swim-up bars), five exquisite restaurants to choose from and two snack bars for when you're after a quick bite. The MySenses Spa is a haven where hydrotherapy treatments, signature massages and facials are on the menu. Meanwhile, keen golfers will enjoy access to the nearby Nick Price-designed 'El Tinto' Golf Club, just a 10-minute drive from the resort.

hotels.title: Oceanfront Cancun Escape with Beach Access, 8 Restaurants & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant energy of Cancun at this luxurious retreat located in the heart of the city's bustling entertainment district. A have-it-all kind of resort with endless options for tasting authentic Mexican or international cuisine, bars that offer stunning vistas and delicious drinks, an infinity pool for adults and kids' pool for the little ones, truly providing something for all ages. Just steps from the pristine white sands of Punta Cancun, this hotel is the perfect launchpad for exploring the area's renowned nightlife, shopping and dining. For those seeking adventure, the ancient Mayan ruins of Tulum are approximately two hours away. A Mexican escape with everything you need right at your fingertips!

hotels.title: Luxurious Five-Star Beachside Escape with Six Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Embrace refined beachside luxury with a five-star stay at Kempinski Hotel Cancún, nestled among Mexico’s most iconic beaches and the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea. Explore the awe-inspiring Mayan ruins or indulge in the unparalleled Kempinski hospitality within the hotel. Delight in live piano jazz, sparkling refreshments, and exquisite dining at six renowned restaurants, or rejuvenate with ancient Mayan wellness treatments infused with modern sophistication at Kayantá Spa.
